class.name: TextServerExtension
class.description: External [TextServer] implementations should inherit from this class.

method.name: _cleanup
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] This method is called before text server is unregistered.

method.name: _create_font
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Creates a new, empty font cache entry resource.

method.name: _create_font_linked_variation
method.description: Optional, implement if font supports extra spacing or baseline offset. Creates a new variation existing font which is reusing the same glyph cache and font data.

method.name: _create_shaped_text
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Creates a new buffer for complex text layout, with the given [param direction] and [param orientation].

method.name: _draw_hex_code_box
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Draws box displaying character hexadecimal code.

method.name: _font_clear_glyphs
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Removes all rendered glyph information from the cache entry.

method.name: _font_clear_kerning_map
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Removes all kerning overrides.

method.name: _font_clear_size_cache
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Removes all font sizes from the cache entry.

method.name: _font_clear_textures
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Removes all textures from font cache entry.

method.name: _font_draw_glyph
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Draws single glyph into a canvas item at the position, using [param font_rid] at the size [param size].

method.name: _font_draw_glyph_outline
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Draws single glyph outline of size [param outline_size] into a canvas item at the position, using [param font_rid] at the size [param size].

method.name: _font_get_antialiasing
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns font anti-aliasing mode.

method.name: _font_get_ascent
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns the font ascent (number of pixels above the baseline).

method.name: _font_get_baseline_offset
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns extra baseline offset (as a fraction of font height).

method.name: _font_get_char_from_glyph_index
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns character code associated with [param glyph_index], or [code]0[/code] if [param glyph_index] is invalid.

method.name: _font_get_descent
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns the font descent (number of pixels below the baseline).

method.name: _font_get_disable_embedded_bitmaps
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns whether the font's embedded bitmap loading is disabled.

method.name: _font_get_embolden
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns font embolden strength.

method.name: _font_get_face_count
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns number of faces in the TrueType / OpenType collection.

method.name: _font_get_face_index
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns an active face index in the TrueType / OpenType collection.

method.name: _font_get_fixed_size
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns bitmap font fixed size.

method.name: _font_get_fixed_size_scale_mode
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns bitmap font scaling mode.

method.name: _font_get_generate_mipmaps
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns [code]true[/code] if font texture mipmap generation is enabled.

method.name: _font_get_global_oversampling
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns the font oversampling factor, shared by all fonts in the TextServer.

method.name: _font_get_glyph_advance
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns glyph advance (offset of the next glyph).

method.name: _font_get_glyph_contours
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns outline contours of the glyph.

method.name: _font_get_glyph_index
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns the glyph index of a [param char], optionally modified by the [param variation_selector].

method.name: _font_get_glyph_list
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns list of rendered glyphs in the cache entry.

method.name: _font_get_glyph_offset
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns glyph offset from the baseline.

method.name: _font_get_glyph_size
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns size of the glyph.

method.name: _font_get_glyph_texture_idx
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns index of the cache texture containing the glyph.

method.name: _font_get_glyph_texture_rid
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns resource ID of the cache texture containing the glyph.

method.name: _font_get_glyph_texture_size
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns size of the cache texture containing the glyph.

method.name: _font_get_glyph_uv_rect
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns rectangle in the cache texture containing the glyph.

method.name: _font_get_hinting
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns the font hinting mode. Used by dynamic fonts only.

method.name: _font_get_keep_rounding_remainders
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns glyph position rounding behavior. If set to [code]true[/code], when aligning glyphs to the pixel boundaries rounding remainders are accumulated to ensure more uniform glyph distribution. This setting has no effect if subpixel positioning is enabled.

method.name: _font_get_kerning
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns kerning for the pair of glyphs.

method.name: _font_get_kerning_list
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns list of the kerning overrides.

method.name: _font_get_language_support_override
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns [code]true[/code] if support override is enabled for the [param language].

method.name: _font_get_language_support_overrides
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns list of language support overrides.

method.name: _font_get_msdf_pixel_range
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns the width of the range around the shape between the minimum and maximum representable signed distance.

method.name: _font_get_msdf_size
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns source font size used to generate MSDF textures.

method.name: _font_get_name
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns font family name.

method.name: _font_get_opentype_feature_overrides
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns font OpenType feature set override.

method.name: _font_get_ot_name_strings
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns [Dictionary] with OpenType font name strings (localized font names, version, description, license information, sample text, etc.).

method.name: _font_get_oversampling
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns font oversampling factor, if set to [code]0.0[/code] global oversampling factor is used instead. Used by dynamic fonts only.

method.name: _font_get_scale
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns scaling factor of the color bitmap font.

method.name: _font_get_script_support_override
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns [code]true[/code] if support override is enabled for the [param script].

method.name: _font_get_script_support_overrides
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns list of script support overrides.

method.name: _font_get_size_cache_list
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns list of the font sizes in the cache. Each size is [Vector2i] with font size and outline size.

method.name: _font_get_spacing
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns the spacing for [param spacing] (see [enum TextServer.SpacingType]) in pixels (not relative to the font size).

method.name: _font_get_stretch
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns font stretch amount, compared to a normal width. A percentage value between [code]50%[/code] and [code]200%[/code].

method.name: _font_get_style
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns font style flags, see [enum TextServer.FontStyle].

method.name: _font_get_style_name
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns font style name.

method.name: _font_get_subpixel_positioning
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns font subpixel glyph positioning mode.

method.name: _font_get_supported_chars
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns a string containing all the characters available in the font.

method.name: _font_get_supported_glyphs
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns an array containing all glyph indices in the font.

method.name: _font_get_texture_count
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns number of textures used by font cache entry.

method.name: _font_get_texture_image
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns font cache texture image data.

method.name: _font_get_texture_offsets
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns array containing glyph packing data.

method.name: _font_get_transform
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns 2D transform applied to the font outlines.

method.name: _font_get_underline_position
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns pixel offset of the underline below the baseline.

method.name: _font_get_underline_thickness
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns thickness of the underline in pixels.

method.name: _font_get_variation_coordinates
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns variation coordinates for the specified font cache entry.

method.name: _font_get_weight
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns weight (boldness) of the font. A value in the [code]100...999[/code] range, normal font weight is [code]400[/code], bold font weight is [code]700[/code].

method.name: _font_has_char
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns [code]true[/code] if a Unicode [param char] is available in the font.

method.name: _font_is_allow_system_fallback
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns [code]true[/code] if system fonts can be automatically used as fallbacks.

method.name: _font_is_force_autohinter
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns [code]true[/code] if auto-hinting is supported and preferred over font built-in hinting.

method.name: _font_is_language_supported
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns [code]true[/code], if font supports given language ([url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_639-1]ISO 639[/url] code).

method.name: _font_is_multichannel_signed_distance_field
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns [code]true[/code] if glyphs of all sizes are rendered using single multichannel signed distance field generated from the dynamic font vector data.

method.name: _font_is_script_supported
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns [code]true[/code], if font supports given script (ISO 15924 code).

method.name: _font_remove_glyph
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Removes specified rendered glyph information from the cache entry.

method.name: _font_remove_kerning
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Removes kerning override for the pair of glyphs.

method.name: _font_remove_language_support_override
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Remove language support override.

method.name: _font_remove_script_support_override
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Removes script support override.

method.name: _font_remove_size_cache
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Removes specified font size from the cache entry.

method.name: _font_remove_texture
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Removes specified texture from the cache entry.

method.name: _font_render_glyph
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Renders specified glyph to the font cache texture.

method.name: _font_render_range
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Renders the range of characters to the font cache texture.

method.name: _font_set_allow_system_fallback
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] If set to [code]true[/code], system fonts can be automatically used as fallbacks.

method.name: _font_set_antialiasing
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Sets font anti-aliasing mode.

method.name: _font_set_ascent
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Sets the font ascent (number of pixels above the baseline).

method.name: _font_set_baseline_offset
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Sets extra baseline offset (as a fraction of font height).

method.name: _font_set_data
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Sets font source data, e.g contents of the dynamic font source file.

method.name: _font_set_data_ptr
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Sets pointer to the font source data, e.g contents of the dynamic font source file.

method.name: _font_set_descent
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Sets the font descent (number of pixels below the baseline).

method.name: _font_set_disable_embedded_bitmaps
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] If set to [code]true[/code], embedded font bitmap loading is disabled.

method.name: _font_set_embolden
method.description: Sets font embolden strength. If [param strength] is not equal to zero, emboldens the font outlines. Negative values reduce the outline thickness.

method.name: _font_set_face_index
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Sets an active face index in the TrueType / OpenType collection.

method.name: _font_set_fixed_size
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Sets bitmap font fixed size. If set to value greater than zero, same cache entry will be used for all font sizes.

method.name: _font_set_fixed_size_scale_mode
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Sets bitmap font scaling mode. This property is used only if [code]fixed_size[/code] is greater than zero.

method.name: _font_set_force_autohinter
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] If set to [code]true[/code] auto-hinting is preferred over font built-in hinting.

method.name: _font_set_generate_mipmaps
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] If set to [code]true[/code] font texture mipmap generation is enabled.

method.name: _font_set_global_oversampling
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Sets oversampling factor, shared by all font in the TextServer.

method.name: _font_set_glyph_advance
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Sets glyph advance (offset of the next glyph).

method.name: _font_set_glyph_offset
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Sets glyph offset from the baseline.

method.name: _font_set_glyph_size
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Sets size of the glyph.

method.name: _font_set_glyph_texture_idx
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Sets index of the cache texture containing the glyph.

method.name: _font_set_glyph_uv_rect
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Sets rectangle in the cache texture containing the glyph.

method.name: _font_set_hinting
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Sets font hinting mode. Used by dynamic fonts only.

method.name: _font_set_keep_rounding_remainders
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Sets glyph position rounding behavior. If set to [code]true[/code], when aligning glyphs to the pixel boundaries rounding remainders are accumulated to ensure more uniform glyph distribution. This setting has no effect if subpixel positioning is enabled.

method.name: _font_set_kerning
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Sets kerning for the pair of glyphs.

method.name: _font_set_language_support_override
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Adds override for [method _font_is_language_supported].

method.name: _font_set_msdf_pixel_range
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Sets the width of the range around the shape between the minimum and maximum representable signed distance.

method.name: _font_set_msdf_size
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Sets source font size used to generate MSDF textures.

method.name: _font_set_multichannel_signed_distance_field
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] If set to [code]true[/code], glyphs of all sizes are rendered using single multichannel signed distance field generated from the dynamic font vector data. MSDF rendering allows displaying the font at any scaling factor without blurriness, and without incurring a CPU cost when the font size changes (since the font no longer needs to be rasterized on the CPU). As a downside, font hinting is not available with MSDF. The lack of font hinting may result in less crisp and less readable fonts at small sizes.

method.name: _font_set_name
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Sets the font family name.

method.name: _font_set_opentype_feature_overrides
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Sets font OpenType feature set override.

method.name: _font_set_oversampling
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Sets font oversampling factor, if set to [code]0.0[/code] global oversampling factor is used instead. Used by dynamic fonts only.

method.name: _font_set_scale
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Sets scaling factor of the color bitmap font.

method.name: _font_set_script_support_override
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Adds override for [method _font_is_script_supported].

method.name: _font_set_spacing
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Sets the spacing for [param spacing] (see [enum TextServer.SpacingType]) to [param value] in pixels (not relative to the font size).

method.name: _font_set_stretch
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Sets font stretch amount, compared to a normal width. A percentage value between [code]50%[/code] and [code]200%[/code].

method.name: _font_set_style
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Sets the font style flags, see [enum TextServer.FontStyle].

method.name: _font_set_style_name
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Sets the font style name.

method.name: _font_set_subpixel_positioning
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Sets font subpixel glyph positioning mode.

method.name: _font_set_texture_image
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Sets font cache texture image data.

method.name: _font_set_texture_offsets
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Sets array containing glyph packing data.

method.name: _font_set_transform
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Sets 2D transform, applied to the font outlines, can be used for slanting, flipping, and rotating glyphs.

method.name: _font_set_underline_position
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Sets pixel offset of the underline below the baseline.

method.name: _font_set_underline_thickness
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Sets thickness of the underline in pixels.

method.name: _font_set_variation_coordinates
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Sets variation coordinates for the specified font cache entry.

method.name: _font_set_weight
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Sets weight (boldness) of the font. A value in the [code]100...999[/code] range, normal font weight is [code]400[/code], bold font weight is [code]700[/code].

method.name: _font_supported_feature_list
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns the dictionary of the supported OpenType features.

method.name: _font_supported_variation_list
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns the dictionary of the supported OpenType variation coordinates.

method.name: _format_number
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Converts a number from the Western Arabic (0..9) to the numeral systems used in [param language].

method.name: _free_rid
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Frees an object created by this [TextServer].

method.name: _get_features
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns text server features, see [enum TextServer.Feature].

method.name: _get_hex_code_box_size
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns size of the replacement character (box with character hexadecimal code that is drawn in place of invalid characters).

method.name: _get_name
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns the name of the server interface.

method.name: _get_support_data
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns default TextServer database (e.g. ICU break iterators and dictionaries).

method.name: _get_support_data_filename
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns default TextServer database (e.g. ICU break iterators and dictionaries) filename.

method.name: _get_support_data_info
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns TextServer database (e.g. ICU break iterators and dictionaries) description.

method.name: _has
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns [code]true[/code] if [param rid] is valid resource owned by this text server.

method.name: _has_feature
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns [code]true[/code] if the server supports a feature.

method.name: _is_confusable
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns index of the first string in [param dict] which is visually confusable with the [param string], or [code]-1[/code] if none is found.

method.name: _is_locale_right_to_left
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns [code]true[/code] if locale is right-to-left.

method.name: _is_valid_identifier
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns [code]true[/code] if [param string] is a valid identifier.

method.name: _load_support_data
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Loads optional TextServer database (e.g. ICU break iterators and dictionaries).

method.name: _name_to_tag
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Converts readable feature, variation, script, or language name to OpenType tag.

method.name: _parse_number
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Converts [param number] from the numeral systems used in [param language] to Western Arabic (0..9).

method.name: _parse_structured_text
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Default implementation of the BiDi algorithm override function. See [enum TextServer.StructuredTextParser] for more info.

method.name: _percent_sign
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns percent sign used in the [param language].

method.name: _save_support_data
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Saves optional TextServer database (e.g. ICU break iterators and dictionaries) to the file.

method.name: _shaped_get_span_count
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns number of text spans added using [method _shaped_text_add_string] or [method _shaped_text_add_object].

method.name: _shaped_get_span_embedded_object
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns text embedded object key.

method.name: _shaped_get_span_meta
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns text span metadata.

method.name: _shaped_set_span_update_font
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Changes text span font, font size, and OpenType features, without changing the text.

method.name: _shaped_text_add_object
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Adds inline object to the text buffer, [param key] must be unique. In the text, object is represented as [param length] object replacement characters.

method.name: _shaped_text_add_string
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Adds text span and font to draw it to the text buffer.

method.name: _shaped_text_clear
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Clears text buffer (removes text and inline objects).

method.name: _shaped_text_closest_character_pos
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns composite character position closest to the [param pos].

method.name: _shaped_text_draw
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Draw shaped text into a canvas item at a given position, with [param color]. [param pos] specifies the leftmost point of the baseline (for horizontal layout) or topmost point of the baseline (for vertical layout).

method.name: _shaped_text_draw_outline
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Draw the outline of the shaped text into a canvas item at a given position, with [param color]. [param pos] specifies the leftmost point of the baseline (for horizontal layout) or topmost point of the baseline (for vertical layout).

method.name: _shaped_text_fit_to_width
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Adjusts text width to fit to specified width, returns new text width.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_ascent
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns the text ascent (number of pixels above the baseline for horizontal layout or to the left of baseline for vertical).

method.name: _shaped_text_get_carets
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns shapes of the carets corresponding to the character offset [param position] in the text. Returned caret shape is 1 pixel wide rectangle.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_character_breaks
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns array of the composite character boundaries.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_custom_ellipsis
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns ellipsis character used for text clipping.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_custom_punctuation
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns custom punctuation character list, used for word breaking. If set to empty string, server defaults are used.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_descent
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns the text descent (number of pixels below the baseline for horizontal layout or to the right of baseline for vertical).

method.name: _shaped_text_get_direction
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns direction of the text.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_dominant_direction_in_range
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns dominant direction of in the range of text.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_ellipsis_glyph_count
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns number of glyphs in the ellipsis.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_ellipsis_glyphs
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns array of the glyphs in the ellipsis.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_ellipsis_pos
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns position of the ellipsis.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_glyph_count
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns number of glyphs in the buffer.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_glyphs
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns an array of glyphs in the visual order.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_grapheme_bounds
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns composite character's bounds as offsets from the start of the line.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_inferred_direction
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns direction of the text, inferred by the BiDi algorithm.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_line_breaks
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Breaks text to the lines and returns character ranges for each line.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_line_breaks_adv
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Breaks text to the lines and columns. Returns character ranges for each segment.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_object_glyph
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns the glyph index of the inline object.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_object_range
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns the character range of the inline object.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_object_rect
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns bounding rectangle of the inline object.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_objects
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns array of inline objects.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_orientation
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns text orientation.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_parent
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns the parent buffer from which the substring originates.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_preserve_control
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns [code]true[/code] if text buffer is configured to display control characters.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_preserve_invalid
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns [code]true[/code] if text buffer is configured to display hexadecimal codes in place of invalid characters.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_range
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns substring buffer character range in the parent buffer.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_selection
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns selection rectangles for the specified character range.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_size
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns size of the text.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_spacing
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns extra spacing added between glyphs or lines in pixels.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_trim_pos
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns the position of the overrun trim.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_underline_position
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns pixel offset of the underline below the baseline.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_underline_thickness
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns thickness of the underline.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_width
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns width (for horizontal layout) or height (for vertical) of the text.

method.name: _shaped_text_get_word_breaks
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Breaks text into words and returns array of character ranges. Use [param grapheme_flags] to set what characters are used for breaking (see [enum TextServer.GraphemeFlag]).

method.name: _shaped_text_hit_test_grapheme
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns grapheme index at the specified pixel offset at the baseline, or [code]-1[/code] if none is found.

method.name: _shaped_text_hit_test_position
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns caret character offset at the specified pixel offset at the baseline. This function always returns a valid position.

method.name: _shaped_text_is_ready
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns [code]true[/code] if buffer is successfully shaped.

method.name: _shaped_text_next_character_pos
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns composite character end position closest to the [param pos].

method.name: _shaped_text_next_grapheme_pos
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns grapheme end position closest to the [param pos].

method.name: _shaped_text_overrun_trim_to_width
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Trims text if it exceeds the given width.

method.name: _shaped_text_prev_character_pos
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns composite character start position closest to the [param pos].

method.name: _shaped_text_prev_grapheme_pos
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns grapheme start position closest to the [param pos].

method.name: _shaped_text_resize_object
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Sets new size and alignment of embedded object.

method.name: _shaped_text_set_bidi_override
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Overrides BiDi for the structured text.

method.name: _shaped_text_set_custom_ellipsis
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Sets ellipsis character used for text clipping.

method.name: _shaped_text_set_custom_punctuation
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Sets custom punctuation character list, used for word breaking. If set to empty string, server defaults are used.

method.name: _shaped_text_set_direction
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Sets desired text direction. If set to [constant TextServer.DIRECTION_AUTO], direction will be detected based on the buffer contents and current locale.

method.name: _shaped_text_set_orientation
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Sets desired text orientation.

method.name: _shaped_text_set_preserve_control
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] If set to [code]true[/code] text buffer will display control characters.

method.name: _shaped_text_set_preserve_invalid
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] If set to [code]true[/code] text buffer will display invalid characters as hexadecimal codes, otherwise nothing is displayed.

method.name: _shaped_text_set_spacing
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Sets extra spacing added between glyphs or lines in pixels.

method.name: _shaped_text_shape
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Shapes buffer if it's not shaped. Returns [code]true[/code] if the string is shaped successfully.

method.name: _shaped_text_sort_logical
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns text glyphs in the logical order.

method.name: _shaped_text_substr
method.description: [b]Required.[/b] Returns text buffer for the substring of the text in the [param shaped] text buffer (including inline objects).

method.name: _shaped_text_tab_align
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Aligns shaped text to the given tab-stops.

method.name: _shaped_text_update_breaks
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Updates break points in the shaped text. This method is called by default implementation of text breaking functions.

method.name: _shaped_text_update_justification_ops
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Updates justification points in the shaped text. This method is called by default implementation of text justification functions.

method.name: _spoof_check
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns [code]true[/code] if [param string] is likely to be an attempt at confusing the reader.

method.name: _string_get_character_breaks
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns array of the composite character boundaries.

method.name: _string_get_word_breaks
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns an array of the word break boundaries. Elements in the returned array are the offsets of the start and end of words. Therefore the length of the array is always even.

method.name: _string_to_lower
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns the string converted to lowercase.

method.name: _string_to_title
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns the string converted to title case.

method.name: _string_to_upper
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Returns the string converted to uppercase.

method.name: _strip_diacritics
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Strips diacritics from the string.

method.name: _tag_to_name
method.description: [b]Optional.[/b] Converts OpenType tag to readable feature, variation, script, or language name.
